game.name: TableTop Soccer: Redux
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠, 전략
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: TTS is back with another fresh take on strategic and tactical games - skill based goal keepers, physics based kicking, 10 player teams, full steam multiplayer, new graphics, offline play and lots more
game.shortDescriptionEn: TTS is back with another fresh take on strategic and tactical games - skill based goal keepers, physics based kicking, 10 player teams, full steam multiplayer, new graphics, offline play and lots more
